category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_significant_relation_types_for_CAEAnalysis
preference.preference_description: This is an optional preference. Defines significant relationship types for CAEAnalysis item revisions and its subtypes. The system considers only those objects attached via relation types configured in the above preference while performing Check for Later Revision, Check for Attachment Change and Check for References. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values; each string must be a valid Teamcenter relationship.
